subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Steven Matz, the team’s top pick in the 2009 amateur draft, had Tommy John elbow surgery a year later and has traveled a long and arduous road to return to the mound.
snippet: Steven Matz, the team’s top pick in the 2009 amateur draft, had Tommy John elbow surgery a year later and has traveled a long and arduous road to return to the mound.
